name: APPLESHOT GAME
description:
A CRINGY GAME MADE ON VB .NET

!THIS IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT STAGE , SO PLEASE REPORT ERRORS ON COMMENTS!

OBJECTIVES:-
----------------
*CHOOSE THE TIME TILL YOU WANT TO PLAY

*SEE HOW MANY TIMES YOU CAN HIT THE APPLE WITH THE KNIFE
 WITHIN THE TIME RANGE BY PRESSING ENTER/SPACE OR CLICKING THE THROW BUTTON

*IF YOU MISS THE  TARGET YOU LOOSE

*ENJOY !
